name: The House of the Dead 4
overview:
The House of the Dead 4 is an on rails light gun shooter.

Players take on the role of James Taylor and Kate Green and fight their way through six chapters of zombies and super-natural monsters, with a boss fight at the end of each chapter. Throughout the game there are cut scenes to tell the background story.

The arcade machine has prop uzi guns with motion controls. Players can shake the guns to fight off zombies when they get too close.
